text: Mohamed Al-Deayea (born 2 August 1972) is a former Saudi Arabian football player. He was a goalkeeper. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup ACL Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Al-Ta'ee
